name: How Much Money Can You Make?
name_original: How Much Money Can You Make?
description:
How Much Money Can You Make? This is a simple game to test your luck.

You are given £100 to try and see how much money you can make. All you have to do is match your number with the top number. Simply press the 'Pick your number' and 'Generate Number' buttons to play.

How lucky are you feeling?

*Not real money*
